title: Nakba Remembrance Day 2024
description: Commemorating the Nakba with speakers, stories, and a solidarity march.

title: Palestinian Food Festival
description: A celebration of Palestinian cuisine and culture with traditional dishes and cultural performances.

title: Run for Palestine 5K
description: Run or walk in solidarity! All ages welcome. Proceeds support Palestinian families.

title: Palestine Awareness Day
description: Join us in raising awareness about Palestinian history, culture, and current humanitarian needs.

description: Educational workshop on Palestinian history, the Nakba, and ongoing humanitarian crisis.

description: An evening of Palestinian culture, solidarity, and fundraising for humanitarian relief efforts.

title: Palestinian Cultural Night
description: Celebrate Palestinian culture with traditional music, dabke dancing, and authentic cuisine.
